abstract: As if Larry Ellison didn’t have enough on hands after inking a $7.4 billion deal to buy Sun Microsystems, the Oracle chief said Wednesday he is interested in buying the Golden State Warriors.
snippet: As if Larry Ellison didn’t have enough on hands after inking a $7.4 billion deal to buy Sun Microsystems, the Oracle chief said Wednesday he is interested in buying the Golden State Warriors.
lead_paragraph: As if Larry Ellison didn’t have enough on his hands after signing a $7.4 billion deal to buy Sun Microsystems, the Oracle chief said Wednesday he is interested in buying the Golden State Warriors.

headline.main: N.B.A.’s Warriors May Be Ellison’s Next Purchase
